name: Pong (itch) (Vahin Sharma)
description:
A simple pong game made by Vahin Sharma.

Controls:

  •  Move the mouse to move your paddle (on the right).
  • Hold the space bar to pause/resume.
  • After you win/lose, click anywhere in the window to restart the game.

If you find any bugs/glitches, please leave a comment about it.
